doc.field: Subseries A: ATN publicity includes promotional materials such as posters and brochures, and press. Subseries B: Documentation of Organizational Activity includes materials such as photographs, distribution catalogues, and conference proceedings. Subseries C: TV Magazine includes materials related to the production of the magazine such as mock-ups. Subseries D: Correspondence includes collected correspondence organized alphabetically by organization, event, or recipient. Subseries E: Organizational Materials includes contracts, grant materials, and other documents relevant to the organization's functioning. Subseries F: Financial Materials includes bank statements, ledgers, and tax information concerning the Artists Television Network.
